recommendations: Rajaraman Venkataraman “Navjeet is a go-getter. He is clear about his learning and professional roadmap and executes on it. He was a great asset on the projects he worked with me. I admire him for demonstrating a great deal of maturity and hunger to learn during his stint at BRIDGEi2i. I really appreciate his intent to go the extra mile in researching and providing valuable insights related to the client problem. I am sure he would continue to remain a valuable asset to teams he works with in future as well. ”
